Entries.default:
"My lord-master... what would you have of me?"

He bows deeply, the metal bangles around his wrists and neck clanging softly.
Entries.female:
"My lady-mistress... what would you have of me?"

He bows deeply, the metal bangles around his wrists and neck clanging softly.

Entries.default: "If you're willing to join my crew, there's a stipend in it for you. It'll be hard work but fair."
"Get below the decks. You're my shiphand now and you'll work yourself till you bleed."
"Nothing. You're free now."
He jerks, clearly surprised.

"As you wish, my lord-master."

He clenches his fists at his side, and though he says no more, his arms quiver from the strain of holding back. As he trudged off, his back remains ramrod straight.
Entries.female:
"As you wish, my lady-mistress"

He clenches his fists at his side, and though he says no more, his arms quiver from the strain of holding back. As he trudged off, his back remains ramrod straight.

Entries.default: He stumbles, shocked. His lips part but for several moments, no words escape. Then finally a groan eases free.
"Good day, my lord-master."

"I... and then you..."

He rubs at the back of his neck, seemingly startled by the band of metal that brushes his palm.
"You could join my crew. That'd be a great help."
"You're free now. Good luck and take care."
"I will." He nods eagerly, shoulders rigid with tension.
He chokes on his intended reply, beating on his chest to catch his breath before he can further speak.

"Truly? You mean it? I can never thank you enough for such kindness.

"Gods, I... Where should I go? I've nothing to my name but these clothes - and my freedom."
"The Temple of Berath in Neketaka would welcome you."
"Go wherever you most desire."
"That's not my problem."
"Because of this?" He waves a hand to indicate his face and horns.

"I will endeavor to desire somewhere quickly, then. Thank you again, and be well."

He bows swiftly before parting.
He shrugs, working at the manacles around his wrists.
"I don't know how or why you've killed them, but I do thank you."
"I am, and I will. Thank you for the kindness, my lord."
Entries.female: "I am, and I will. Thank you for the kindness, my lady."

Entries.default: "They don't just revere death godlikes, they need them. You'd be valued and well cared for."
"It is a face only a goddess could love."

"I understand. Thank you. I will tell them you sent me."

He bows in parting.

"I see. Then I suppose they must take me."

He bows stiffly in parting.
"Well, I thank you all the same. Maybe we'll meet again one day. I hope not, but I cannot say."
"They've closed the gate!"
"You could join my crew, if you'd like. The work's hard work but fair. And I'll pay you for it."
He jerks, clearly surprised.
"Thank you for the kindness, my lord."
Entries.female: "Thank you for the kindness, my lady."
